messages.message:
Team - Can we provide OCR confidence for Fields and characters with Abby OCR engine and how do we do it?
Prospect has previously explored Abby OCR and were only able to get Document Confidence level. Is this something we can do and if so, how?
Thanks!

@Faisal This function provides consolidated doc level confidence:
https://instabase.com/docs/reference/refiner/ocr-functions/
But if the customer needs char level confidence, we have that info too.. Here is an example:

https://instabase.com/hari/demo-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/files/paystub-1/out/s1_process_files/09-14-16%20Paystubs.PDF.ibdoc

Search for the key "confidence" you will see all the different char level info here.
